title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 703.4 - Extension clinics
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 703.4 - Extension clinics

State Regulations

Notwithstanding the requirements of this Chapter, extension clinics shall submit to the department a plan acceptable to the
commissioner governing the location and objectives of the extension clinic, the
relationships to the parent organization and a detailed program of
operation. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
703.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
